'''Void Ward''', also called '''Void Shield'''<ref>Tutorial: [[Tutorial/"Cocouik"'s Rings of Light|"Cocouik"'s Rings of Light]]</ref>, is a [[Game System|mechanic]] unique to [[enemies]] in [[Natlan]].

While present, it prevents an enemy from taking DMG and requires a certain number of Elemental attacks to destroy. Nightsoul-aligned Elemental attacks damages them with '''3''' times the efficiency.
